Starcrossed Light Crossbow.name: 穿星 轻弩
Starcrossed Light Crossbow.description:
武器 （轻弩），珍稀（需同调）

这种魔法弓或弩在通常装载着弹药的弹道上安装着一组复杂排列的，作为变焦狙击镜的妄质晶块 delerium shards，这把轻弩并不使用弹药，作为代替它会魔法性地召唤出弹药。使用这把武器发动的攻击和伤害掷骰获得+2 加值，造成光耀伤害而不是穿刺伤害，并忽略弹药和装填属性。

这个武器有 3 发充能，每天黎明时都会恢复全部充能。当你用它进行远程攻击命中时，你可以使箭矢爆发出耀眼的闪光。你命中的目标和距离它 10 尺以内的任何生物必须通过 DC 15 的体质豁免，否则将陷入目盲 blinded，直到你的下个回合结束。

Starcrossed Shortbow.name: 穿星 短弓
Starcrossed Shortbow.description:
武器 （短弓），珍稀（需同调）

这种魔法弓或弩在通常装载着弹药的弹道上安装着一组复杂排列的，作为变焦狙击镜的妄质晶块 delerium shards，这把短弓并不使用弹药，作为代替它会魔法性地召唤出弹药。使用这把武器发动的攻击和伤害掷骰获得+2 加值，造成光耀伤害而不是穿刺伤害，并忽略弹药和装填属性。

这个武器有 3 发充能，每天黎明时都会恢复全部充能。当你用它进行远程攻击命中时，你可以使箭矢爆发出耀眼的闪光。你命中的目标和距离它 10 尺以内的任何生物必须通过 DC 15 的体质豁免，否则将陷入目盲 blinded，直到你的下个回合结束。

Delerium-Forged Blade (Greatsword).name: Delerium-Forged Blade (Greatsword)
Delerium-Forged Blade (Greatsword).description:
Weapon (greatsword), rare

This sword has a small delerium sliver encased in glass and set in the hilt like a gemstone. The blade is made of meteoric iron infused with delerium dust, which causes it to softly glow with octarine light.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

When you make an attack with this weapon, you can use your spellcasting ability modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. In addition, you can use this weapon as a spellcasting focus.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon against a humanoid, the humanoid must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take an extra 3d6 necrotic damage and gain one level of contamination.

Mageborn.name: Mageborn
Mageborn.description:
Requirement: You must be a bard, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard

You manifested arcane magical abilities at a young age, and were taken into the guardianship of the Amethyst Academy. You learned to harness your magic at a secluded magical school. After you came of age and completed your apprenticeship, you became free to pursue your own interests, but you must respect the laws and customs that govern all those with spellcasting powers. Under the Edicts of Lumen, mages are disinherited of any noble titles, and cannot own land.

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.GQk8616W5sG08f7Z rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.9HB9cUtsP2sUinSu rollable]

Variant Mageborn: Malfeasant Mage

You were expelled from the Amethyst Academy for some trespass, real or imagined, or perhaps you were never taken in by them and learned magic on your own. Common folk are often mistrustful of spellcasters who do not wear the Amethyst Academy colours, so you may need to hide your identity and abilities, especially from the Amethyst Academy and the Knights of the Silver Order.

Detail-Oriented.name: Detail-Oriented
Detail-Oriented.description: You double your proficiency bonus when making any ability check to search the ruins of Drakkenheim.

Comet Smasher (Quarterstaff).name: Comet Smasher (Quarterstaff)
Comet Smasher (Quarterstaff).description:
Weapon (quarterstaff), very rare (requires attunement)

The head of this bludgeoning weapon is made from a massive delerium crystal that crackles with arcane energies. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, it unleashes an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}. You can roll twice on the table and choose either result.

Devoted Missionary.name: Devoted Missionary
Devoted Missionary.description:
You are a follower of one of the many religions of the world. Through either divine calling, visions, or prophecies, or because your church sent you as an envoy and representative, or maybe because you are seeking divine answers, you have made the journey to Drakkenheim. What sacred purpose lies in the ruins that you are quested with uncovering?

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.K6X6c1HOX2lL1FPN rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.r18dEI6FYp2rJovG rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.NRrT1PrHmeQrdfn0 rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.5bNkmXpkxauZoGuG rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.wOfZok3KTaldCReV rollable]

Variant Devoted Missionary: Stargazer

You witnessed the meteor 15 years ago. Whether you believe it to be destiny, a magical or divine calling, or just curiosity of the secrets that need to be unearthed, you are drawn to the crater. You believe that the crater holds some answers to the questions you seek, and that somewhere in Drakkenheim lies a truth beyond your comprehension. Your pilgrimage to Drakkenheim may have taken you weeks, months or even years but you had to come - something called you here and you must discover its origin.

Delerium-Forged Blade (Rapier).name: Delerium-Forged Blade (Rapier)
Delerium-Forged Blade (Rapier).description:
Weapon (rapier), rare

This sword has a small delerium sliver encased in glass and set in the hilt like a gemstone. The blade is made of meteoric iron infused with delerium dust, which causes it to softly glow with octarine light.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

When you make an attack with this weapon, you can use your spellcasting ability modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. In addition, you can use this weapon as a spellcasting focus.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon against a humanoid, the humanoid must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take an extra 3d6 necrotic damage and gain one level of contamination.

Guided by Faith.name: Guided by Faith
Guided by Faith.description: A number of times per day equal to your proficiency bonus, you may ask the Game Master to reveal the DC of any ability check you make before rolling the dice. You may then decide whether or not you wish to attempt the roll.

Comet Smasher (Club).name: Comet Smasher (Club)
Comet Smasher (Club).description:
Weapon (club), very rare (requires attunement)

The head of this bludgeoning weapon is made from a massive delerium crystal that crackles with arcane energies. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, it unleashes an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}. You can roll twice on the table and choose either result.

Aqua Delerium.name: 妄质汁 Aqua Delerium
Aqua Delerium.description:
药水, 珍稀

这种紫色的药水散发着微弱的第八虹色光芒，它在有塞子的小瓶子里卷起小漩涡，闪闪发光。

当你喝下这种药水时，你会恢复消耗的法术位。投掷 [[/r 1d6 #Aqua Delerium]] ，你可以选择总和环数等于或小于结果的法术位进行恢复。不能恢复任何高于 5 环的法术位。

你在饮用妄质汁后的一个小时内，每次施展 1 环或更高环阶的法术时掷 1d20。结果出 1 时，你会触发一个随机的 @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}.

如果你在完成长休前喝下了超过一瓶 妄质汁，那么恢复的法术位每有一个环阶，你就会受到（[[/damage 1d12 necrotic average]]）黯蚀伤害，并且你的最大生命值会减少相当于此伤害的数值，直到你完成一次长休。这种伤害无论如何都无法减少或避免。 before finishing your next long rest, you take 1d12 necrotic damage for each spell level regained, and your hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken until you finish a long rest. This damage can't be reduced or prevented in any way.

当一个不能使用法术槽施放法术的生物喝下妄质汁 时，它会受到 [[/damage 3d6 necrotic average]] 黯蚀伤害并获得一个污染等级。

Aqua Expurgo.name: Aqua Expurgo
Aqua Expurgo.description:
Potion, rare

This bright orange fluid is stored in a syringe and charged with arcane magic. You can use an action to administer the shot directly to the heart of yourself or another willing creature.

You are protected against contamination for six hours after receiving a dose of aqua expurgo. During this time, whenever you fail a saving throw against an effect that would cause you to gain one or more contamination levels, you can choose to succeed instead. You can use this ability three times, after which the effects of aqua expurgo expire.

If the effects of aqua expurgo expire in this manner, you immediately take 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and become incapacitated for 1 minute while you violently retch corrupt bile. Your hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until you finish a long rest. You die if this effect reduces your hit point maximum to 0. The necrotic damage can't be reduced or prevented by any means.

Comet Smasher (Greatclub).name: Comet Smasher (Greatclub)
Comet Smasher (Greatclub).description:
Weapon (greatclub), very rare (requires attunement)

The head of this bludgeoning weapon is made from a massive delerium crystal that crackles with arcane energies. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, it unleashes an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}. You can roll twice on the table and choose either result.

Bottled Comet.name: Bottled Comet
Bottled Comet.description:
Wondrous item, rare

This spherical glass orb contains an ignited delerium shard hovering gently within. Electrical currents of yellow, green, and purple energy streak from the crystal and cascade along the glass, rendering it warm to the touch.

As an action you can throw the orb up to 30 feet. It shatters on impact, releasing a 20-foot-radius burst of contaminated energy. Creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution save or take 8d6 necrotic damage, and take one level of contamination. In addition, an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly} occurs, centred on the point of impact.

Chancellor's Crest.name: Chancellor's Crest
Chancellor's Crest.description:
Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement)

While wearing this amulet, you can read all writing, and speak and understand any language.

You can use an action to cast one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ppWAAEul0QHtm4er], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.GtGjNjPBgUHxGYAD], or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.uAwtVZkiSTyP6ORB]. Once the amulet has been used to cast one of these spells, it can't be used to cast that spell again until the next dawn. You can choose your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score as the spellcasting ability for casting these spells, and use your proficiency bonus to determine their attack bonus and saving throw DC.

Foundry Note

If you would like to change the spellcasting ability modifier from the default of Intelligence to either Wisdom or Charisma, modify each activity on the item to suit your needs.

Crown of Westemär.name: Crown of Westemär
Crown of Westemär.description:
Wondrous item, legendary (requires attunement)

A character may only attune to the Crown of Westemär by performing a special one hour ceremony with six other characters who are each attuned to a different Seal of Drakkenheim. See the "Developments" section in @UUID[JournalEntry.drakkenc09chapte]{Chapter 9: Castle Drakken} for details on this ritual.

The crown has 3 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz] spell from it. The crown regains one expended charge every ten years.

The ancient bronze dragon Minazorond, the tower dragons, and the wall gargoyles are under your control and obey your spoken commands while you wear the crown.

While wearing the crown and seated on the Throne of Drakkenheim in Castle Drakken, you may use an action to communicate telepathically with one dragon or twelve gargoyles so long as they are within 100 miles of Castle Drakken. When you do, you can issue commands to those creatures, see through one of the creature's eyes, and hear what it hears until the start of your next turn, gaining the benefits of any special senses that the creature has. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

Comet Smasher (Flail).name: Comet Smasher (Flail)
Comet Smasher (Flail).description:
Weapon (flail), very rare (requires attunement)

The head of this bludgeoning weapon is made from a massive delerium crystal that crackles with arcane energies. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, it unleashes an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}. You can roll twice on the table and choose either result.

Flame Lance.name: Flame Lance
Flame Lance.description:
Weapon (lance), uncommon

This weapon is a long metal lance with a small flame that burns at its end. It has a hose coming from the hilt that connects to a metal tank that you wear on your back.

You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

The tank has 5 charges. You can use an action and expend one or more charges from the tank to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.5SuJewoa1CRWaj1F] (Save DC 15). For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.

Once per day, you can pour a vial of @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.FvNOwWbh5FXyX4xe] into the tank. When you do, it regains all expended charges. It otherwise does not regain charges on its own.

Delerium-Forged Blade (Scimitar).name: Delerium-Forged Blade (Scimitar)
Delerium-Forged Blade (Scimitar).description:
Weapon (scimitar), rare

This sword has a small delerium sliver encased in glass and set in the hilt like a gemstone. The blade is made of meteoric iron infused with delerium dust, which causes it to softly glow with octarine light.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

When you make an attack with this weapon, you can use your spellcasting ability modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. In addition, you can use this weapon as a spellcasting focus.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon against a humanoid, the humanoid must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take an extra 3d6 necrotic damage and gain one level of contamination.

Hardened Delerium-Tipped Arrows.name: Hardened Delerium-Tipped Arrows
Hardened Delerium-Tipped Arrows.description:
Weapon (any arrow or bolt), rare

This piece of ammunition has a refined delerium arrowtip. A creature hit by a ranged attack using one of these arrows takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of contamination. Once it hits a target, the delerium tip crumbles to dust and the arrow becomes nonmagical.

Comet Smasher (Maul).name: Comet Smasher (Maul)
Comet Smasher (Maul).description:
Weapon (maul), very rare (requires attunement)

The head of this bludgeoning weapon is made from a massive delerium crystal that crackles with arcane energies. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, it unleashes an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}. You can roll twice on the table and choose either result.

Hazewalker Plate.name: Hazewalker Plate
Hazewalker Plate.description:
Armour (plate), very rare

This plate armour includes a helmet and is hermetically sealed when worn. You gain the following benefits when its worn and the helmet visor is closed:

  • You are immune to diseases and the poisoned condition, and gain advantage on saving throws against any effect that causes contamination.
  • You have resistance to necrotic and poison damage.
  • You don't need to breathe.

Helm of Patron Saints.name: Helm of Patron Saints
Helm of Patron Saints.description:
Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement by a spellcaster)

While wearing this helm, you can see invisible creatures and objects within 60 feet of you. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls, and increase your spell saving throw DC by 2.

Continental Nobility.name: Continental Nobility
Continental Nobility.description:
Requirements: Any class except sorcerer, warlock, or wizard

You are the scion of a noble household. Whether you hail from Caspia, Elyria, or Westemär, the fall of Drakkenheim has either adversely impacted your family’s fortunes, or created a tantalizing opportunity to increase your political power and influence.

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.gVaMk7m5gfDl4J4f rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.cc5FS6EkjQAG1FeD rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.uM3gA4EcOcrnVPkN rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.bT8BCCRRpUm1KaBW rollable]

@Embed[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.RJOeRdKfNeWc69Sz rollable]

Variant: Last of the Line

In the years following the destruction of Drakkenheim, calamity and misfortune wracked your house leaving you the sole surviving heir. Penniless and without land, you have come to Drakkenheim to rebuild your family’s legacy.

Noble Confidence.name: Noble Confidence
Noble Confidence.description: During a short rest you can give an inspiring pep talk to a number of allies equal to your proficiency bonus. Once in the next 8 hours, each of those allies can roll 1d4 and add it to the result of a single attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

Makeshift Meals.name: Makeshift Meals
Makeshift Meals.description: You know how to purify food and rations found in the ruins. When you take a short rest, you prepare a meal for a number of creatures equal to your proficiency bonus. Creatures who consume the food regain hit points equal to your level. Once they do, they can’t regain hit points from another one of your meals until they finish a long rest.

Ignacious, the Sword of Burning Truth.name: Ignacious, the Sword of Burning Truth
Ignacious, the Sword of Burning Truth.description:
Weapon (longsword), legendary (requires attunement)

This sacred weapon was forged to burn away deception and darkness. Blazing embers gently fall from the silver blade, first ignited by the brazier in the Temple of Lumen.

  • You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the following additional properties:
  • You can use a bonus action to speak the sword's name, causing radiant flames to erupt from the blade. These flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra 4d6 radiant damage to any target it hits. The flames last until you use a bonus action to douse the blade, or until you drop or sheathe the sword.

Sentience. Ignacious is a sentient lawful good weapon with an Intelligence of 11, a Wisdom of 19, and a Charisma of 23. It has hearing and darkvision out to a range of 120 feet. The weapon can speak, read, and understand Common, Celestial, and Draconic, and can communicate with its wielder telepathically. It always knows its wielder's thoughts. Its voice is commanding, righteous, and booming. When drawn, Ignacious casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CylBa7jR8DSbo8Z3] spell (save DC 20), and maintains concentration on it so that you don't have to. The zone of truth moves with the blade and remains centred on it.

Personality. Ignacious is zealously devoted to the Sacred Flame, and has memorized every word of its holy texts. The blade wishes to be wielded by a faithful devotee of any sort; Ignacious does not care about the religious divide between the Falling Fire and the Sacred Flame so long as its wielder keeps the core tenets shared by both sects.

The sword's purpose is to expose all deception and reveal the truth. It does not tolerate any falsehood, duplicitousness, or lies. The sword always knows when it hears a lie, and responds with wrathful fury. If a wielder speaks a lie, it immediately triggers a conflict.

Inscrutable Staff.name: Inscrutable Staff
Inscrutable Staff.description:
Staff, legendary (requires attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)

This staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. While holding it, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and your spell save DC.

The staff has 20 charges, and regains 2d10 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff triggers a random arcane anomaly. On a 20, the staff regains 1d10 charges.

While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend some of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Szvk5FEVQW3uhJi5] (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yqUDoxk4x0NWG5Bz] (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ImlCJQwR1VL40Qem] (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A4RsPuSvB9wFtz1j] (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.a2KJHCIbY5Mi4Dmn] (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.o9ZCvuD2B1OTcubb] (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.HBHbOGKNVVprSlwn] (6 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ERCv7yuRkQ0YjGx6] (7 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.clwv2PWOcT822hlr] (8 charges)

You can also use an action to cast one of the following spells from the staff without using any charges: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.bnjXlk13ZRJuf5d0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CKZTpZlxj7hjjo2H], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.icZokbgV1jIMpNCv], or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL].

Lord Commander's Badge.name: Lord Commander's Badge
Lord Commander's Badge.description:
Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement)

As an action while wearing this seal, you can invoke its power to issue a bellowing command clearly audible to all creatures within 300 feet of you. When you do, you may choose up to 12 allies you can see who can hear the command. Those allies each gain 20 temporary hit points. While these temporary hit points remain, those allies gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. Once you use this power, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

Purging Rod.name: Purging Rod
Purging Rod.description:
Rod, uncommon

Once per day while holding this rod, you can use an action to cast @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.spells.Item.PurT000000000008]. After casting the spell, roll 1d20. On a 1, the rod melts into sludge.

Refined Delerium Dust.name: 精炼妄质尘
Refined Delerium Dust.description:
奇物, 珍稀

这个袋子里装着一盎司经过净化并被魔法充能的妄质粉尘。它可以被用一个动作吸入。当你吸了一满袋后，你在一分钟内发动的法术攻击和对法术所做的豁免具有优势。

当你吸精炼妄质尘时，你会得到一层 污染。

Refined Delerium Dust.name: 精炼妄质尘
Refined Delerium Dust.description: 当你吸了一满袋后，你在一分钟内发动的法术攻击和对法术所做的豁免具有优势。

Saint Vitruvio's Phylactery.name: 圣维特鲁维奥护身符
Saint Vitruvio's Phylactery.description:
奇物, 珍稀 (需要吟游诗人、牧师、德鲁伊或圣武士同调)

你可以用一个动作施展施展护身符的以下法术之一：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e_collection_2024.phb-content.Item.t1RUq0PQkeJfELIr]{祝福术} , @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e_collection_2024.phb-content.Item.dRuvDWlDoKsg694E]{防死结界} ，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e_collection_2024.phb-content.Item.1cgU7tJNnvOtYXzK]{高等复原术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e_collection_2024.phb-content.Item.qfp0jwBiXlFpjyPD]{治疗祷言}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e_collection_2024.phb-content.Item.41g2fyraSDkFXG7L]{回生术}。这些法术使用你的施法属性和豁免 DC。一旦护身符被用来施展其中一个法术，直到第二天黎明才能再次施展该法术。

这件物品同时属于德拉肯海姆信物和圣维特鲁维奥圣遗物。

Sceptre of Saint Vitruvio.name: 圣维特鲁维奥节杖
Sceptre of Saint Vitruvio.description:
法杖,珍稀 （需要施法者同调）

这根法杖可以作为魔法长棍使用，用其发动的攻击和伤害掷骰获得+2 加值。该法杖有 10 发充能。你可以在持握它时用一个动作消耗它的 1 发或更多充能，用你的法术豁免 DC 施展它的以下法术之一：UUID[Compendium.dnd5e_collection_2024.phb-content.Item.oDSWFRiXQkUXQ1jf]{光导箭} (1 充能),@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e_collection_2024.phb-content.Item.K760oyqaj53JHFQA]{炽焰法球}(2 充能), 或者UUID[Compendium.dnd5e_collection_2024.phb-content.Item.UomGNTGNS8dSuOnA] {焰击术} (5 充能)。每天黎明时法杖恢复 1d6+4 消耗的充能。

Skymetal Shield.name: 天坠铁盾
Skymetal Shield.description:
盾牌, 非普通（需同调）

这个盾牌由陨铁铸成，上面装饰着妄质水晶浮雕。当你在持握护盾时被近战或远程攻击命中，你可以用你的反应吸收攻击中的残余能量。你如常受到攻击的伤害和效果，这块盾牌获得 1 点充能。盾牌最多可以有 5 发充能。每天黎明时没有消耗的充能都会消失。

在持握盾牌时，你可以用一个动作消耗它的所有充能来释放强力爆炸。距离你 10 尺以内的生物必须成功通过一次 DC 15 体质豁免。该区域内的生物豁免失败时会受到每发充能 [[/r 1d6]] 的力场伤害，并被向后击退 10 尺且倒地 prone。

Skymetal Staff.name: 天坠铁杖 Skymetal Staff
Skymetal Staff.description:
武器 (长棍), 珍稀 （需同调）

这根长棍用精炼陨铁制成，带有一颗液态的妄质核心。

在你的回合里一回合一次，当你用这把武器近战攻击一个生物时，你可以迫使目标进行 [[/save int 13]] 豁免。豁免失败时它会额外受到（[[/r 3d6]]）的心灵伤害，并且在你下一回合开始前无法做出反应。此外，在该生物的下个回合中，其必须选择动作、附赠动作或移动：它只能执行这三种行为的其中一种。

Starcrossed Heavy Crossbow.name: 穿星 重弩
Starcrossed Heavy Crossbow.description:
武器 （重弩），珍稀（需同调）

这种魔法弓或弩在通常装载着弹药的弹道上安装着一组复杂排列的，作为变焦狙击镜的妄质晶块 delerium shards，这把重弩并不使用弹药，作为代替它会魔法性地召唤出弹药。使用这把武器发动的攻击和伤害掷骰获得+2 加值，造成光耀伤害而不是穿刺伤害，并忽略弹药和装填属性。

这个武器有 3 发充能，每天黎明时都会恢复全部充能。当你用它进行远程攻击命中时，你可以使箭矢爆发出耀眼的闪光。你命中的目标和距离它 10 尺以内的任何生物必须通过 DC 15 的体质豁免，否则将陷入目盲 blinded，直到你的下个回合结束。

Spellpiercing Wand.name: 刺法魔杖
Spellpiercing Wand.description:
魔杖, 非普通 (（需要施法者同调)

你可以用这根魔杖作为法器。生物对这个魔杖施展的法术所做的豁免无法获得优势\n魔杖，非普通（需要施法者同调）。

Spymaster's Signet.name: 间谍总管的印戒
Spymaster's Signet.description:
戒指,传说（需同调）

你在戴着这枚戒指时可以随意施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv]{易容术}。

你可以用一个动作进入隐形 invisible 状态。你穿着或持握的任何物件也都处于隐形状态。你保持隐形一分钟，或者直到你使用附赠动作解除隐形。一旦你使用了这种力量，它直到第二天黎明之前都不能再使用。

Staff of Contaminated Power.name: 秽力法杖
Staff of Contaminated Power.description:
法杖, 传说 (需要由法师、术士或邪术师同调)

这根法杖可以作为魔法长棍使用，用其发动的攻击和伤害掷骰获得+2 加值。

法杖有 20 发充能可用于以下特性。法杖放置在浓厚污霭 Deep Haze 中每小时可以恢复 1 发充能。你也可以用法杖触碰一块妄质水晶 delerium crystals，使其恢复 [[/r 2d8 + 4 #Delerium Crystal]] 发充能，然后水晶碎成尘埃。如果你消耗了最后一发充能，你会立即获得 [[/r 1d6]] 级的污染。/p>

法术： 你在持握法杖时可以使用一个动作来消耗它的数发充能，使用你的法术豁免 DC 和施法属性来施展以下法术之一： @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.spells.Item.DelT000000000004] (1 充能), @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.spells.Item.WarT000000000012] (2 充能), @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.spells.Item.RidT000000000009] (3 充能), @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.spells.Item.DelT000000000003] (4 充能), @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.spells.Item.ConT000000000000] (5 充能), and @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.spells.Item.RayT000000000010] (6 充能)。 当你使用这根法杖的充能施展这些法术时，你不会获得任何污染等级。

Steward's Seal.name: 总管印章
Steward's Seal.description: 奇物，珍稀（需同调）你在佩戴此徽章时可以随意施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]{法师之手}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.udsLtG0BugXHR2JQ]{魔法伎俩}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Kn7K5PtYUJAKZTTp]{净化粮食}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ccduLIvutyNqvkgv]{隐形 仆役} 。你可以用一个动作来施展放以下的其中一个法术： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ATo0Eb63TDtnu6iA]{活化物件}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.BV0mpbHh29IbbIj5]{造粮术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]{解除魔法}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.HQfd7jJyULIoGxrZ]{心灵遥控}。一旦徽章被用来施展其中一种法术，它直到第二天黎明之前不能再被用来施展该法术。建议你可以选择你的智力、感知或魅力作为施法属性，并使用你的熟练加值来决定它们的攻击加值和豁免 DC 并在物品设置中调整相应的设置。

The Shield of Sacred Flame.name: 圣火盾 The Shield of Sacred Flame
The Shield of Sacred Flame.description:
盾牌，珍稀（需同调）

这个盾牌有 3 发充能，在每天黎明时恢复全部充能。当距离你 60 尺以内的施法者以你为目标施法或是其施展的法术的范围将你包含在内时，你可以用反应消耗一发盾牌的充能来施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Ek45cBpVXvJdv1Qy]{法术反制}。

Survivor.name: 幸存者
Survivor.description:
并非每个人都在陨石撞击后离开德拉肯海姆。有些人选择留下，搜索废墟中失去的东西：朋友、家人，或者只是寻找财宝和文物。你知道城市中最危险的地方，最佳的行进路径，并且通常能快速找到旅行的最佳方式。尽管迷雾危险重重，但你还是成功活了下来，背负着德拉肯海姆的疯狂之重。

变体幸存者：内战老兵

你作为士兵或逃亡的难民，在肆虐韦斯特梅尔的内战中幸存下来。这场战争从你身上夺走了某些东西，并改变了你。可能是你不得不做一些违背道德的事情，或者你在流血中失去了朋友和家人。无论如何，你带着难以愈合的伤痕离开了。

Comet Smasher (Light Hammer).name: Comet Smasher (Light Hammer)
Comet Smasher (Light Hammer).description:
Weapon (light hammer), very rare (requires attunement)

The head of this bludgeoning weapon is made from a massive delerium crystal that crackles with arcane energies. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, it unleashes an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}. You can roll twice on the table and choose either result.

Comet Smasher (Mace).name: Comet Smasher (Mace)
Comet Smasher (Mace).description:
Weapon (mace), very rare (requires attunement)

The head of this bludgeoning weapon is made from a massive delerium crystal that crackles with arcane energies. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, it unleashes an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}. You can roll twice on the table and choose either result.

Bookworm.name: Bookworm
Bookworm.description: Once per day after you finish a long rest, you can spend one hour to create a spell scroll. You need only paper and ink to do so, and the level of the spell you can create equals one half your proficiency bonus (rounded down) or lower. The scroll you create must be a spell you know or have prepared.

Delerium-Forged Blade (Shortsword).name: Delerium-Forged Blade (Shortsword)
Delerium-Forged Blade (Shortsword).description:
Weapon (shortsword), rare

This sword has a small delerium sliver encased in glass and set in the hilt like a gemstone. The blade is made of meteoric iron infused with delerium dust, which causes it to softly glow with octarine light.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

When you make an attack with this weapon, you can use your spellcasting ability modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. In addition, you can use this weapon as a spellcasting focus.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon against a humanoid, the humanoid must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take an extra 3d6 necrotic damage and gain one level of contamination.

Starcrossed Hand Crossbow.name: 穿星 手弩
Starcrossed Hand Crossbow.description:
武器 （手弩），珍稀（需同调）

这种魔法弓或弩在通常装载着弹药的弹道上安装着一组复杂排列的，作为变焦狙击镜的妄质晶块 delerium shards，这把手弩并不使用弹药，作为代替它会魔法性地召唤出弹药。使用这把武器发动的攻击和伤害掷骰获得+2 加值，造成光耀伤害而不是穿刺伤害，并忽略弹药和装填属性。

这个武器有 3 发充能，每天黎明时都会恢复全部充能。当你用它进行远程攻击命中时，你可以使箭矢爆发出耀眼的闪光。你命中的目标和距离它 10 尺以内的任何生物必须通过 DC 15 的体质豁免，否则将陷入目盲 blinded，直到你的下个回合结束。

Delerium Crystal Focus.name: Delerium Crystal Focus
Delerium Crystal Focus.description:
Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement by a spellcaster)

This focus is made from a refined delerium crystal encased in a glass orb. While holding it, you gain a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your spells. In addition, you can use the crystal as a spellcasting focus.

Once per day when you cast a spell of 5th level or lower, you may draw on the energy stored within the crystal to do so without expending a spell slot. If you do, you trigger a random @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}.

Delerium-Forged Blade (Longsword).name: Delerium-Forged Blade (Longsword)
Delerium-Forged Blade (Longsword).description:
Weapon (longsword), rare

This sword has a small delerium sliver encased in glass and set in the hilt like a gemstone. The blade is made of meteoric iron infused with delerium dust, which causes it to softly glow with octarine light.

You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

When you make an attack with this weapon, you can use your spellcasting ability modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. In addition, you can use this weapon as a spellcasting focus.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon against a humanoid, the humanoid must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take an extra 3d6 necrotic damage and gain one level of contamination.

Treasure Seeker.name: 寻宝者
Treasure Seeker.description:
你被失落的财宝和珍贵的文物吸引来到了德拉肯海姆。也许是因为赚取比你一生花费更多的金币的前景太过诱人，或许你是为了寻求那些具有历史或宗教意义的物品。

变体：赏金客

你不是通过寻宝来获得财富，而是通过追捕现在德拉肯海姆中潜藏的土匪、亡命徒和怪物赚钱。只要价格合适，你就常常会去接危险的悬赏。危险是你的第二天性，和狩猎的刺激与它带给你的金币相比，这座城市的恐怖微不足道。

Comet Smasher (Warhammer).name: Comet Smasher (Warhammer)
Comet Smasher (Warhammer).description:
Weapon (warhammer), very rare (requires attunement)

The head of this bludgeoning weapon is made from a massive delerium crystal that crackles with arcane energies. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra 3d6 necrotic damage.

When you roll a 20 on an attack roll made with this weapon, it unleashes an @UUID[Compendium.drakkenheim-core.tables.RollTable.pPGtKhPFFcHortCT]{arcane anomaly}. You can roll twice on the table and choose either result.
